title: BOARDWALK / RAILING
description: You've discovered Idiot Doom Spiral's missing jacket.

dialogueTree.title: Railing: "Someone has left an unidentifiable..."
dialogueTree.english: Someone has left an unidentifiable article of clothing on this railing. It smells really bad.
dialogueTree.polish: Ktoś pozostawił na barierce niezidentyfikowany element ubioru. Który strasznie śmierdzi.
dialogueTree.belarusian: Хтось пакінуў на загарадзі неідэнтыфікаваны элемент адзення. Які жахліва смярдзіць.

links.title: You: "Touch it."
links.english: Touch it.
links.polish: Dotknij go.
links.belarusian: Дакраніся да яго.

links.title: Railing: "The cloth, if you can still call it..."
links.english: The cloth, if you can still call it that, makes a soft crunching sound as you thrust your finger into it.
links.polish: Ubranie, jeśli wciąż można użyć tego miana, wydaje z siebie ciche chrupnięcie, kiedy dźgasz je palcem.
links.belarusian: Адзенне, калі ўсё яшчэ можна ўжыць гэтае найменне, выдае ціхае храбусценне, калі ты кусаеш яго пальцам.

links.title: You: "Take a closer look."
links.english: Take a closer look.
links.polish: Przyjrzyj się dokładniej.
links.belarusian: Прыгледзься ўважлівей.

links.title: Railing: "It's streaked with dried seagull sh..."
links.english: It's streaked with dried seagull shit and tangled with pieces of seaweed. A dangling arm suggests that there might be a jacket beneath the crust of filth.
links.polish: Poznaczony jest wyschniętym mewim gównem i ubrudzony kawałkami wodorostów. Obecność rękawa zdaje się sugerować, że pod tą warstwą brudu ukryta jest jakaś kurtka.
links.belarusian: Памечаны высахлым чаіцым памётам і выпацканыя кавалкамі водарасцей. Наяўнасць рукава здаецца мяркуе, што пад гэтым слоем бруду хаваецца нейкая куртка.

links.title: Logic: "It seems likely that it was left in..."
links.english: It seems likely that it was left in the surf until someone laid it out on this fence to dry out. Unfortunately that just seems to have stiffened it into a shapeless mass.
links.polish: Wygląda na to, że ubranie unosiło się na wodzie, dopóki ktoś nie powiesił go tutaj, żeby przeschło. Niestety, zamiast tego zesztywniało tylko i zmieniło się w bezkształtną masę.
links.belarusian: Падобна, што адзенне плавала на вадзе, пакуль нехта не павесіў яго тут, каб яно падсохла. На жаль, замест гэтага яно проста зацвярдзела і ператварылася ў бясформеную масу.

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Please tell me you're not taking t..."
links.english: "Please tell me you're not taking that with you."
links.polish: „Powiedz, proszę, że nie zamierzasz tego ze sobą zabrać”.
links.belarusian: «Скажы, калі ласка, што ты не збіраешся гэта з сабой браць».

links.title: You: ""I think this is the jacket the Idi..."
links.english: "I think this is the jacket the Idiot Doom Spiral Guy wanted me to find."
links.polish: „Myślę, że to właśnie tę kurtkę chciał odnaleźć ten Idiota w Spirali Katastrof”.
links.belarusian: «Мне здаецца, што менавіта гэтую куртку хацеў знайсці гэты Ідыёт у Спіралі Катастроф».

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: "The lieutenant looks at the stinkin..."
links.english: The lieutenant looks at the stinking rag and sniffs. "I'm sure he'll be *thrilled* to have it returned."
links.polish: Porucznik spogląda na śmierdzącą szmatę i pociąga nosem. „Na pewno *ucieszy się*, gdy ją odzyska”.
links.belarusian: Лейтэнант глядзіць на смярдзючую анучу і цягне носам. «Напэўна, *узрадуецца*, калі яе верне».

links.title: You: ""Why not?""
links.english: "Why not?"
links.polish: „Czemu nie?”
links.belarusian: "Чаму не?"

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""It's a guano-encrusted jacket. And..."
links.english: "It's a guano-encrusted jacket. And you're already carrying around enough as it is."
links.polish: „To kurtka pokryta guanem. I bez niej masz przy sobie mnóstwo rzeczy”.
links.belarusian: «Гэта куртка, пакрытая гуана. І без яе ў цябе з сабой шмат рэчаў».

links.title: You: ""It might be a clue.""
links.english: "It might be a clue."
links.polish: „To może być wskazówka”.
links.belarusian: «Гэта можа быць падказкай».

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""A clue? You think our suspect is a..."
links.english: "A clue? You think our suspect is a seagull who's been defecating on unsuspecting jackets?"
links.polish: „Wskazówka? Myślisz, że nasz podejrzany to mewa, która defekuje na niespodziewające się niczego kurtki?”
links.belarusian: «Намёк? Думаеш, што наш падазраваны — гэта чайка, якая абсырае нічога не падазравальныя курткі?»

links.title: You: ""No.""
links.english: "No."
links.polish: „Nie”.
links.belarusian: «Не».

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Me neither.""
links.english: "Me neither."
links.polish: „Ja też nie”.
links.belarusian: «Я таксама не».

links.title: Interfacing: "You should still take it. It's prob..."
links.english: You should still take it. It's probably Doom Spiral's.
links.polish: Mimo wszystko powinieneś ją wziąć. Należy pewnie do Idioty.
links.belarusian: Тым не менш, ты павінен яе ўзяць. Напэўна, яна належыць Ідыёту.

links.title: Interfacing: "You should still take it."
links.english: You should still take it.
links.polish: Mimo wszystko powinieneś ją wziąć.
links.belarusian: Усё ж такі ты павінен яе ўзяць.

links.title: You: ""Yes.""
links.english: "Yes."
links.polish: „Tak”.
links.belarusian: «Так».

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: "The lieutenant sighs."
links.english: The lieutenant sighs.
links.polish: Porucznik wzdycha.
links.belarusian: Лейтэнант уздыхае.

links.title: Conceptualization: "A poet could write a dozen verses a..."
links.english: A poet could write a dozen verses and still not begin to capture the profound vexation in that sigh.
links.polish: Choćby wielki poeta napisał tuzin wersetów, wciąż nie zdołałby uchwycić głębi udręki zawartej w tym westchnieniu.
links.belarusian: Хоць бы вялікі паэт напісаў тузін вершаў, ён усё роўна не здолеў бы злавіць глыбіню пакуты, якая змяшчаецца ў гэтым уздыху.

links.title: You: ""It could have been multiple seagul..."
links.english: "It could have been multiple seagulls."
links.polish: „To mogło być wiele mew”.
links.belarusian: «Гэта маглі быць многія чайкі».

links.title: Interfacing: "Much as the thought of touching it..."
links.english: Much as the thought of touching it causes you to cringe, this could be the jacket that the idiot in the colourful tracksuit was looking for...
links.polish: Choć sama myśl o dotknięciu tego materiału sprawia, że się wzdrygasz, to może być ta kurtka, której szukał przygłup w kolorowym dresie...
links.belarusian: Хоць сама думка аб дотыку да гэтага матэрыялу прымушае цябе ўздрыгнуць, гэта можа быць тая куртка, якую шукаў дурань у каляровым спартыўным касцюме...

links.title: Inland Empire: "This jacket reeks of loss and failu..."
links.english: This jacket reeks of loss and failure. It could be the one that the idiot in the colourful tracksuit was looking for...
links.polish: Kurtka cuchnie utratą i porażką. To może być ta, której szukał przygłup w kolorowym dresie...
links.belarusian: Куртка смярдзіць стратай і паразай. Гэта можа быць тая, якую шукаў дурань у каляровым трэніку...

links.title: You: "Maybe later. [Leave.]"
links.english: Maybe later. [Leave.]
links.polish: Może później. [Odejdź].
links.belarusian: Можа пазней. [Адыдзі].
